info.title: WhatsApp Provisioning  API
info.description: The WhatsApp Manager API enables customers to deploy a WhatsApp cluster, perform One Time Password (OTP) verification, and update profile information

post.description: This API request provisions a WhatsApp cluster. Once provisioned, the cluster progresses through the following deployment stages: `INITIALIZING`, `CREATING_CLUSTER` and `CLUSTER_CREATED`. When the `CLUSTER_CREATED` stage is reached an OTP voice call or SMS is sent to the specified number and the deployment status becomes `CODE_SENT`. When the OTP is received, call the Verify API to complete the process.

get.description: Retrieves information about the deployment at the given deployment id.

post.description: If you do not receive the code in five minutes then you can request for it to be sent again.

When a code is successfully verified, WhatsApp Manager will move the number from a `CODE_VERIFIED` state to a `FINALIZING` state where additional checks are made and it is assigned to your API Key. Once this is complete it will enter a `READY` state and the number is ready to use.

requestBody.description: Provision WhatsApp deployment and trigger OTP.

image_url.description: Url where the profile photo was pulled from

post.description: Replaces profile photo with photo at the given URL for the deployment.

requestBody.description: URL pointing to a .png or .jpg. Image must be minimum 192px. max 640px x 640px. max 5MB.

image_url.description: URL pointing to a .png or .jpg. Image must be minimum 192px. max 640px x 640px. max 5MB.
Url where the profile photo was pulled from

requestBody.description: URL pointing to a .png or .jpg. Image must be minimum 192px. max 640px x 640px. max 5MB.

publisher.description: The name of the publisher of the third-party stickerpack.

ios_app_store_link.description: The link to the stickerpack in the Apple iOS App Store. The link follows the format https://itunes.apple.com/app/idXXXXXXXXX. To get your App Store link, refer to the instructions at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4137426/get-itunes-link-for-app-before-submitting

android_app_store_link.description: The link to the stickerpack in the Google Play store. The link follows the format https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.example where com.example is your app's package name.

image_data_id.description: The ID for the sticker media.

emojis.description: An array of the emojis included in the stickerpack.

200.description: Return an index of the sitcker

detail.example: Exceeded rate limit for this API, please wait and try again
Deployment could not be created because the verification failed.

name.description: The name of the invalid parameter

reason.description: The reason the parameter is invalid

detail.example: Request was missing a waba_id and could not be processed

reason.example: Url was not in a valid format

detail.example: Description was longer than 256 characters and could not be processed.
Deployment cannot be deleted because it is in the DELETING state.
Deployment does not exist or you do not have access.

title.example: You did not provide correct credentials.

detail.example: Check that you're using the correct credentials, and that your account has this feature enabled

ErrorConflictCreateDeployment.description: Cannot create deployment because the number is already used by another deployment

detail.example: Active deployment already exists with id 21801df5-a3f6-4bd6-8b66-5bde51a909c7

ErrorForbidden.description: Error when account isn't authorized to manage the deployment

detail.example: Your account does not have permission to perform this action - see https://www.vonage.com/communications-apis/contact-api/ for more details about getting signed up to send WhatsApp messages.
Unexpected character ('"' (code 34)): was expecting comma to separate Object entries

about.description: Text to display in your profile's About section - max 139 characters.

description.description: a description of your business - max 256 characters

vertical.description: Your business' industry - must be recognized by WhatsApp.

websites.description: Your business' websites maximum of 2 websites, max website length: 256

method.description: The method the OTP resend will use.

waba_id.description: The WhatsApp Business Account (WABA) ID of the WhatsApp number

country_code.description: The international dialing code of the deployment e.g. `44` for the United Kingdom.

number.description: The phone number of the deployment (minus the international dialing code) e.g. `7700900000`

api_key.description: The API key associated with the deployment.

current_state.description: The current status of the deployment

title.description: The current status of the deployment.

detail.description: Description of the deployment status e.g. `Invalid vname certificate`

country_code.description: The international dialing code of the number being provisioned

method.description: The method for delivering the OTP

waba_id.description: WABA ID of the WhatsApp Number

pin.description: Required if you previously set a PIN when creating a WhatsApp number.

vname_certificate.description:
The certificate, which you can retrieve from your WhatsApp Business dashboard.
> **Note** this value is refreshed whenever you click the View button.

Resend-OTP.description: The method for delivering the OTP

tags.name: OTP
tags.description: Verify or resend a One Time Password (OTP)

number-in-use.description: Cannot use number because it's already in use by another deployment.

invalid-json.description: The request body did not contain valid JSON
invalid-json.resolution: Send a JSON request body, including a Content-Type header of application/json

unprocessable.description: Parameters were valid JSON but something was missing or wrongly formatted
unprocessable.resolution: Fix the incorrect request parameters and try again

unprocessable-profile-update.description: Parameters were valid JSON but something was missing or wrongly formatted
unprocessable-profile-update.resolution: Fix the incorrect request parameters and try again

throttled.description: Too many requests have been made on this endpoint
throttled.resolution: Wait a moment and try again

verification-failed.description: Verification step failed. Either because the the provided code was incorrect or because too many attempts have been made
verification-failed.resolution: Try again with the correct OTP, or call resend-otp

conflict-deployment-state.description: Deployment could not be modified because it is currently in a transitional state.
conflict-deployment-state.resolution: If the deployment is transitioning into the state you want it in no action is required. If the state is `DELETING`, no action is required as the deployment will be deleted. Otherwise, wait for the transition to complete and try again.

conflict-resend-otp.description: Could not resend OTP because the current state of the deployment did not allow it
conflict-resend-otp.resolution: The deployment has either already finished, or is in an error state (in which case you should delete it and run it again).
